entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening. Freezing rain beginning overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 early in the morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
